remarks: A closure in a subspace topology.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Jan-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)
statement:
restcls.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
restcls.2 $e |- K = ( J |`t Y ) $.
restcls $p |- ( ( J e. Top /\ Y C_ X /\ S C_ Y ) -> ( ( cls ` K ) ` S ) = ( ( ( cls ` J ) ` S ) i^i Y ) ) $.
